name: simple-coding-time-tracker
description: Track and visualize your coding time across projects

simpleCodingTimeTracker.inactivityTimeou.description: Pause tracking if there is no keyboard or mouse activity in VS Code for this many seconds.

simpleCodingTimeTracker.focusTimeout.description: If you switch away from VS Code, continue counting as coding time for up to this many seconds before pausing.

simpleCodingTimeTracker.health.enableNot.description: Enable health notifications during coding sessions

simpleCodingTimeTracker.health.modalNoti.description: Make health notifications modal (blocks UI until dismissed) for better visibility

simpleCodingTimeTracker.health.eyeRestIn.description: Interval for eye rest reminders (minutes) - Based on 20-20-20 rule

simpleCodingTimeTracker.health.stretchIn.description: Interval for stretch reminders (minutes) - Recommended for posture health

simpleCodingTimeTracker.health.breakThre.description: Coding duration before suggesting a break (minutes) - Based on ultradian rhythms

commands.title: SCTT: Clear All Time Tracking Data

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.refresh-extension: code --uninstall-extension noorashuvo.simple-coding-time-tracker && vsce package && code --install-extension $(npm pack --quiet)
